title: हिन्दू रिवाज़ का वीडियो भारत में मुस्लिमों पर ज़बरदस्ती गायों को दौड़ाने के रूप में साझा
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Civilisation at its lowest. Indians forcing Muslims men & children to lie on ground & running dozens of heavy cows over their bodies while the spectators applauding the exhibition. Barbaric & inhuman. Modi developing sick Nazi RSS ideology. pic.twitter.com/ufUnqt2oHX
